metadata.siteTitle: AI In Action - Learn AI by Building
metadata.siteDescription: Master AI through hands-on challenge projects. Build real web apps, games, mobile apps, and AI tools.
metadata.challengesDescription: Browse AI practice challenges from beginner to expert.
metadata.pathsDescription: Structured learning paths from beginner to expert. Web, Game, Mobile, and AI Agent development.
metadata.leaderboardDescription: See who's leading in XP and streaks

web-development.name: Web Development
web-development.description: Build modern web applications from responsive portfolios to full-stack platforms.

game-development.name: Game Development
game-development.description: Create browser-based games from classic arcade titles to multiplayer worlds.

mobile-development.name: Mobile App Development
mobile-development.description: Ship cross-platform mobile apps with React Native and Expo.

ai-agents.name: AI Agents & Automation
ai-agents.description: Build intelligent AI-powered agents, from chat bots to autonomous research systems.

ai-writing.name: AI Writing & Content
ai-writing.description: Create AI-powered writing tools, content generators, and text transformation apps.

ai-image.name: AI Image & Design
ai-image.description: Build image generation, editing, and computer vision applications.

ai-video.name: AI Video Generation
ai-video.description: Create AI-powered video generation, editing, and analysis tools.

ai-data.name: AI Data Analysis
ai-data.description: Build intelligent data analysis, visualization, and insight generation tools.

ai-audio.name: AI Audio & Speech
ai-audio.description: Create speech recognition, text-to-speech, music generation, and audio processing apps.

ai-coding.name: AI-Assisted Coding
ai-coding.description: Build AI-powered code generation, review, debugging, and developer tools.

web-development.title: Web Development
web-development.description: Build modern web applications from responsive portfolios to full-stack platforms. Master HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Next.js, databases, and deployment.

game-development.title: Game Development
game-development.description: Create browser-based games from classic arcade titles to multiplayer worlds. Learn canvas, physics, procedural generation, and game architecture.

mobile-development.title: Mobile App Development
mobile-development.description: Ship cross-platform mobile apps with React Native and Expo. Cover gestures, offline-first, device APIs, and app store deployment.

ai-agents.title: AI Agents & LLM Projects
ai-agents.description: Build intelligent AI-powered applications. From chat interfaces to autonomous research agents, master prompting, RAG, tool use, and multi-agent systems.

ai-writing.title: AI Writing & Content
ai-writing.description: Master AI-powered text generation and NLP. Build content generators, writing assistants, translation tools, and publishing platforms using large language models.

ai-image.title: AI Image & Design
ai-image.description: Create AI-powered visual tools from avatar generators to full creative studios. Master image generation APIs, computer vision, style transfer, and visual AI pipelines.

ai-video.title: AI Video Generation
ai-video.description: Build AI-powered video tools from auto-captioning to full production suites. Master video generation, editing automation, real-time effects, and streaming pipelines.

ai-data.title: AI Data Analysis
ai-data.description: Build intelligent data tools from CSV analyzers to full analytics platforms. Master AI-powered visualization, predictive modeling, NL querying, and real-time analytics.

ai-audio.title: AI Audio & Speech
ai-audio.description: Create AI audio applications from text-to-speech readers to music production suites. Master speech recognition, voice synthesis, audio processing, and real-time translation.

ai-coding.title: AI-Assisted Coding
ai-coding.description: Build AI developer tools from code explainers to pair-programming IDEs. Master code generation, automated review, intelligent debugging, and AI-powered development workflows.
